Reviews.Content: staying 5 nights whilst conference found quiet clean remarkably priced hotel hong kong perspective cabs plentiful cost central supermarket door required complaint wifi avaiable lobby costs us12 day expense compared hotels central

Reviews.Title: “Excellent, quiet, friendly, inexpensive”
Reviews.Author: solotravellerCanada
Reviews.Content: stayed nights november 2011 clean quiet friendly staff throughout hotel fairly kept property taxi ride central station downtown hkg 23 usd 3 taxi essential hotel steep uphill climb otherwise breakfast buffet wide selection asian western breakfast offerings internet usd 5 day sluggish complaint internet service cable ethernet bring own cable staff front desk loan excellent value location hong kong ill hesitation recommending hotel despite ywca name guests equal mix women
